name: Cytorex Biosciences
overview:
Cytorex Biosciences is a Florida-based Biopharma company with a patented technology (US Patent 7,1412,51) to treat cancer using an approach that has never been taken before: Inorganic Acids as actives.

Its lead compound is called Cytoreg.

CytoregÂ® is a combination of 4 inorganic acids and 2 organic acids in water, where The Fluoride (F- ion) of Hydrofluoric acid is the active agent.

CytoregÂ® will target and kill cancer cells without affecting normal cells, hence becoming a very effective and safe product to administer to human cancer patients.

The first indication for CytoregÂ® is Glioblastoma Multiforme, a malingnant brain tumor with a very low cure rate. CytoregÂ® can cross the blood brain barrier due to its very low molecular weight.

Clinical Trials ara expected to start late 2010 or early 2011 subject to funding.
